text:
300 #COVID19 #vaccine doses lost in Pueblo, CO & 165 more @aboutKP in Lakewood, CO. Monitoring the #temperature of #freezers storing life-saving vaccines is no longer a "nice to have," it's a MUST have. 

#remotemonitoring #sensors #coldstorage #alerts
